title: A Most Improper Magick
author: Stephanie Burgis
genre: Fiction, Children’s / Young Adult, Historical Fantasy
description: The first book in the Unladylike Adventures of Kat Stephenson. Meeting 12‑year‑old Kat Stephenson — youngest daughter of a country minister and inheritor of her late mother’s magical talents — the story follows Kat as she attempts to save her family from financial ruin. Along the way she must navigate societal expectations in Regency England, uncover dark family secrets about magic, protect her sisters from a dangerous suitor, and face a secret magical Order. Full of adventure, magic, and moral dilemmas, the novel blends historical fiction with fantasy. 247 pages. Published by Templar Publishing (UK).
